full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA GSOL BA 'DEBS TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA GSOL BA 'DEBS TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE'I RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL GYIS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR BLA MA DANG CHOS SKYONG DBYER MED TSUL GYIS MAN NGAG MANG DU THOS PA'I MKHAN CHEN SPRUL MING GIS BGYIS PAS, ,CHOS @006B SKYONG CHEN POS MNYES BZHIN DU RJES SU 'DZIN PA GROGS BYED DE RGYAL BA'I GO 'PHANG BDE BLAG TU THOB PA'I RGYUR 'GYUR CIG , ,,'DI NANG DBEN PA SNYAN RGYUD KYI MAN NGAG GI GNAD YOD PAS SNOD MIN LA GTAN NAS MI STON PA GAL CHE BA LAGS PAS DE LUGS MKHYEN DGOS SO, ,GU HYAS MA YA, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
